extension.summary: mehr als 50.000 kostenlose Internet Radio Sender
more than 50.000 free internet radio stations
extension.description: With this Add-on you can browse more than 50.000 free internet radio stations. Current Features:[CR]- Top 500 Stations[CR]- Browse by genre (and subgenre if enabled in settings)[CR]- Search Station by name[CR]- Search Stations by current playing track[CR]- You can manage a "My Stations"-list[CR]- bitrate and amount of listeners visible and sortable[CR]- 500 Stations on each Page (can be changed in the settings)[CR]- uses cache (24h genre, 1h station listings)[CR]
